title: Error: 31773 segmentation fault (core dumped) phpunit .
body:
Hello.

When I run `phpunit .` on my `tests` directory, I got the following output:

`````` shell
phpunit .                             
PHPUnit 3.6.11 by Sebastian Bergmann.

Configuration read from /var/www/Validation/tests/phpunit.xml

...............................................................  63 / 767 (  8%)
............................................................... 126 / 767 ( 16%)
............................................................... 189 / 767 ( 24%)
............................................................... 252 / 767 ( 32%)
............................................................... 315 / 767 ( 41%)
............................................................... 378 / 767 ( 49%)
............................................................... 441 / 767 ( 57%)
............................................................... 504 / 767 ( 65%)
............................................................... 567 / 767 ( 73%)
............................................................... 630 / 767 ( 82%)
............................................................... 693 / 767 ( 90%)
........................................................SSSSSSS 756 / 767 ( 98%)
S....[11.10.2012 12:21:08 ERROR] [ ZendExtensionManager.cpp : 657 ( sig_handler ) ] ZendExtensionManager got SIG 11 at pid 31773 ! 
[11.10.2012 12:21:08 ERROR] [ ZendExtensionManager.cpp : 670 ( sig_handler ) ] Crash happened during IDLE stage 
[11.10.2012 12:21:08 ERROR] [ ZendExtensionManager.cpp : 673 ( sig_handler ) ] The stack trace follows: 
[11.10.2012 12:21:08 SYSTEM] Obtained 20 stack frames 
[11.10.2012 12:21:08 SYSTEM] /usr/local/zend/lib/ZendExtensionManager.so(_Z11zPrintTraceN6ZDebug8StreamIdE+0x29) [0x7ffec0ab1d09] 
[11.10.2012 12:21:08 SYSTEM] /usr/local/zend/lib/ZendExtensionManager.so(+0x1e5b4) [0x7ffec0a9e5b4] 
[11.10.2012 12:21:08 SYSTEM] /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6(+0x364c0) [0x7ffec144e4c0] 
[11.10.2012 12:21:08 SYSTEM] /usr/local/zend/bin/php(gc_remove_zval_from_buffer+0x24) [0x68f354] 
[11.10.2012 12:21:08 SYSTEM] /usr/local/zend/bin/php(_zval_ptr_dtor+0x89) [0x6661e9] 
[11.10.2012 12:21:08 SYSTEM] /usr/local/zend/bin/php(zend_call_function+0x735) [0x667e15] 
[11.10.2012 12:21:08 SYSTEM] /usr/local/zend/bin/php(zend_call_method+0x1c6) [0x688f66] 
[11.10.2012 12:21:08 SYSTEM] /usr/local/zend/bin/php(zend_std_cast_object_tostring+0xcb) [0x691dfb] 
[11.10.2012 12:21:08 SYSTEM] /usr/local/zend/bin/php(_convert_to_string+0x4e) [0x66b40e] 
[11.10.2012 12:21:08 SYSTEM] /usr/local/zend/bin/php() [0x591d90] 
[11.10.2012 12:21:08 SYSTEM] /usr/local/zend/bin/php() [0x591e67] 
[11.10.2012 12:21:08 SYSTEM] /usr/local/zend/bin/php(zend_call_function+0x8ac) [0x667f8c] 
[11.10.2012 12:21:08 SYSTEM] /usr/local/zend/bin/php(zend_call_method+0x1c6) [0x688f66] 
[11.10.2012 12:21:08 SYSTEM] /usr/local/zend/bin/php(zend_user_it_get_current_data+0x75) [0x689605] 
[11.10.2012 12:21:08 SYSTEM] /usr/local/zend/bin/php() [0x69d3dc] 
[11.10.2012 12:21:08 SYSTEM] /usr/local/zend/bin/php(execute+0x1d3) [0x699213] 
[11.10.2012 12:21:08 SYSTEM] /usr/local/zend/lib/debugger/php-5.3.x/ZendDebugger.so(+0xed9b) [0x7ffeb3012d9b] 
[11.10.2012 12:21:08 SYSTEM] /usr/local/zend/bin/php() [0x699b7e] 
[11.10.2012 12:21:08 SYSTEM] /usr/local/zend/bin/php(execute+0x1d3) [0x699213] 
[11.10.2012 12:21:08 SYSTEM] /usr/local/zend/lib/debugger/php-5.3.x/ZendDebugger.so(+0xed9b) [0x7ffeb3012d9b] 
[1]    31773 segmentation fault (core dumped)  phpunit .```

Any ideas on that?
``````
